Form

<form action="">
    <label for="name">Text</label>
    <input type="text" name="name" id="name" />

    <label for="email">Email*</label>
    <input type="email" name="input-email" id="email" required aria-required="true" />

    <label for="input-url">URL</label>
    <input type="url" name="input-url" id="input-url" aria-describedby="#hint-url" />
    <p id="hint-url">Include "http://" or "https://" in the URL.</p>

    <label for="input-password">Password</label>
    <input type="password" name="input-password" id="input-password" />

    <label for="input-search">Search</label>
    <input type="search" name="input-search" id="input-search" results="5" disabled />

    <fieldset>
        <legend>Select Options</legend>
        <input id="checkbox-1" name="test" type="checkbox" /><label for="checkbox-1">Checkbox 1</label>
        <input id="checkbox-2" name="test" type="checkbox" /><label for="checkbox-2">Checkbox 2</label>
    </fieldset>

    <input type="radio" id="radio-1" name="radio-test" /><label for="radio-1">Radio 1</label>
    <input type="radio" id="radio-2" name="radio-test" /><label for="radio-2">Radio 2</label>

    <label for="zip">Text Zip</label>
    <input type="text" name="zip" id="zip" />

    <label for="input-tel">Tel*</label>
    <input type="tel" name="input-tel" id="input-tel" placeholder="555-555-5555" required aria-required="true" />
    <!-- if erorr, `aria-invalid="true" aria-describedBy="error-1"` -->
    <!-- <p id="error-1">Here's the error message.</p> -->

    <label for="input-date">Date Picker</label>
    <input type="date" name="input-date" id="input-date" />

    <label for="input-file">Choose a File</label>
    <input type="file" name="input-file" id="input-file" />

    <label for="select">Select</label>
    <select name="select-input" id="select">
        <option value="option1">Option 1</option>
        <option value="option2">Option 2</option>
    </select>

    <label for="textarea">Textarea</label>
    <textarea name="textarea" id="textarea"></textarea>

    <input type="submit" value="Submit" />

    <input type="reset" value="Reset" />
</form>
 
<form action="">
    <label for="name">Text</label>
    <input type="text" name="name" id="name" />

    <label for="email">Email*</label>
    <input type="email" name="input-email" id="email" required aria-required="true" />

    <label for="input-url">URL</label>
    <input type="url" name="input-url" id="input-url" aria-describedby="#hint-url" />
    <p id="hint-url">Include "http://" or "https://" in the URL.</p>

    <label for="input-password">Password</label>
    <input type="password" name="input-password" id="input-password" />

    <label for="input-search">Search</label>
    <input type="search" name="input-search" id="input-search" results="5" disabled />

    <fieldset>
        <legend>Select Options</legend>
        <input id="checkbox-1" name="test" type="checkbox" /><label for="checkbox-1">Checkbox 1</label>
        <input id="checkbox-2" name="test" type="checkbox" /><label for="checkbox-2">Checkbox 2</label>
    </fieldset>

    <input type="radio" id="radio-1" name="radio-test" /><label for="radio-1">Radio 1</label>
    <input type="radio" id="radio-2" name="radio-test" /><label for="radio-2">Radio 2</label>

    <label for="zip">Text Zip</label>
    <input type="text" name="zip" id="zip" />

    <label for="input-tel">Tel*</label>
    <input type="tel" name="input-tel" id="input-tel" placeholder="555-555-5555" required aria-required="true" /><!-- if erorr, `aria-invalid="true" aria-describedBy="error-1"` -->
    <!-- <p id="error-1">Here's the error message.</p> -->

    <label for="input-date">Date Picker</label>
    <input type="date" name="input-date" id="input-date" />

    <label for="input-file">Choose a File</label>
    <input type="file" name="input-file" id="input-file" />

    <label for="select">Select</label>
    <select name="select-input" id="select">
        <option value="option1">Option 1</option>
        <option value="option2">Option 2</option>
    </select>

    <label for="textarea">Textarea</label>
    <textarea name="textarea" id="textarea"></textarea>

    <input type="submit" value="Submit" />

    <input type="reset" value="Reset" />
</form>
 
/* No context defined for this component. */
  • Content: 
    * {
    &:focus {
        outline: 2px solid $outline-color;
    }

    &:invalid {      
        &:focus {
         outline: 2px solid $outline-color-error;
        }
    }
}

.focus--mouse {
    outline: none;
}

fieldset {
    padding: 0;
}

legend, label {
    display: block;
    @include primary-font(600);
    font-size: px-to-rem(16px);
    line-height: 1.5;
    color: $mine-shaft;
}

label {
    margin-bottom: 0;
}

legend {
    margin-bottom: px-to-rem(16px);
}

[type="text"], [type="email"], [type="password"], [type="tel"], [type="url"], [type="number"], [type="search"], [type="date"], textarea, select {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    max-width: $form-el-max-width;
    font-size: px-to-rem(16px);
    line-height: 1.5;
    color: $mine-shaft;
    background-color: $white;
    padding: px-to-rem(15px) px-to-rem(16px);
    border: 1px solid $dusty-gray;
    margin-bottom: px-to-rem(32px);
    border-radius: px-to-rem(3px);

    &[disabled] {
        cursor: not-allowed;
        border: 1px solid $alabaster;
        color: $dove-gray;
        background-color: $alabaster;
    }
}

[type="file"]{
    display: block;
    font-size: px-to-rem(16px);
    margin-bottom: px-to-rem(32px);
}

@supports ((-webkit-appearance: none) or (-moz-appearance: none) or (appearance: none)) {
    [type="search"] {
        -webkit-appearance: none;//to keep iOS legacy versions from severely rounding borders
    }
}

textarea {
    min-height: px-to-rem(110px);
}

::placeholder {
    color: $dove-gray;
}

select {
    height: px-to-rem(56px);
    font-size: px-to-rem(16px);
    border: 1px solid $dusty-gray;
    border-radius: px-to-rem(3px);
}

//Custom select
@supports (pointer-events: none) and ((-webkit-appearance: none) or (-moz-appearance: none) or (appearance: none)) {
    select {
        -webkit-appearance: none;
        -moz-appearance: none;
        appearance: none;
        padding-right: px-to-rem(12px) + (px-to-rem(16px) * 2);
        background-image: url('../../assets/img/select-arrow.svg');
        background-size: px-to-rem(12px) px-to-rem(7px);
        background-position: right px-to-rem(16px) center;
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
    }
}

[type="checkbox"], [type="radio"] {
    float: left;
    position: absolute;
    left: -999999rem;

    + label {
        position: relative;
        padding-left: px-to-rem(29px);
        margin-bottom: px-to-rem(16px);
        font-size: px-to-rem(16px);
        font-weight: normal;
        line-height: 1.5;
        color: $dove-gray;
        cursor: pointer;

        &::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: px-to-rem(3px);
            left: 0;
            height: px-to-rem(20px);
            width: px-to-rem(20px);
            background-color: $white;
            border: 1px solid $dusty-gray;
        }
    }

    &:focus {
        + label {
            outline: 1px solid $outline-color;
        }

        &.focus--mouse {
            + label {
                outline: none;
            }
        }
    }

    &:invalid {
        &:focus {
            + label {
                outline: 1px solid $outline-color-error;
            }
        }
    }

    &:disabled {
        + label {
            cursor: not-allowed;

            &::after {
                content: '';
                position: absolute;
                top: px-to-rem(-1px);
                left: px-to-rem(10px);
                background-color: $dusty-gray;
                height: px-to-rem(28px);
                width: px-to-rem(1px);
                transform: rotate(45deg);
                clip-path: circle(1.25rem);
            }
        }
    }

    &:last-of-type {
        + label {
            margin-bottom: px-to-rem(32px);
        }
    }
}

[type="checkbox"] {
    &:hover, &:focus {
        + label {
            &::before {
                border: 2px solid $vidaLoca;
            }
        }
    }

    &:checked {
        + label {
            &::before {
                background-color: $vidaLoca;
                border-radius: px-to-rem(3px);
            }

            &::after {
                content: 'âœ“';
                position: absolute;
                top: px-to-rem(6.5px);
                left: px-to-rem(4px);
                font-size: px-to-rem(14px);
                line-height: 1;
                color: $white;
            }
        }
    }
}

[type="radio"] {
    + label {
        &::before {
            border-radius: 50%;
        }
    }

    &:hover, &:focus {
        + label {
            &::before {
                border: 1px solid $vidaLoca;
            }

            &::after {
                content: '';
                position: absolute;
                top: px-to-rem(10px);
                left: px-to-rem(6.5px);
                height: px-to-rem(6px);
                width: px-to-rem(6px);
                background-color: $vidaLoca;
                border-radius: 50%;
            }
        }
    }

    &:checked {
        + label {
            &::before {
                background-color: $vidaLoca;
            }

            &::after {
                content: '';
                position: absolute;
                top: px-to-rem(10px);
                left: px-to-rem(6.5px);
                height: px-to-rem(6px);
                width: px-to-rem(6px);
                background-color: $white;
                border-radius: 50%;
            }
        }
    }

    &:disabled {
        + label {
            &::after {
                clip-path: circle(0.6rem);
            }
        }
    }
}

[type="reset"] {
    display: block;
    @include remove-button();
    font-size: px-to-rem(16px);
    color: $emperor;
    text-decoration: underline;
    padding: px-to-rem(10px) 0;
    border: none;

    &:hover, &:focus {
        cursor: pointer;
        text-decoration: none;
    }
}

[type="submit"], [type="button"] {
    @include button();
}
